plot: This depiction of childhood and adolescence draws heavily from the filmmaker's own boyhood. Like many of their compatriots, Hou's family moved from the mainland to Taiwan in 1948 and was unable ever to return. The film focuses on the widening generation gap in a family cut off from its cultural heritage.   Written by  International Film Circuit
title: Tiempo de vivir, tiempo de morir (Tong nien wang shi)
